history.proof: intros n ts v s. induction ts using Terms_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHts. scongruence use: LNN2LNT_subTerm.

exceptions.exn: Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

In environment n : nat t : fol.Term LNN ts : fol.Terms LNN n v : nat s : fol.Term LNN IHts : LNN2LNT_terms n (substituteTerms LNN n ts v s) = substituteTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) v (LNN2LNT_term s) Unable to unify "Tcons LNT n (substituteTerm LNT (LNN2LNT_term t) v (LNN2LNT_term s)) (substituteTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) v (LNN2LNT_term s))" with "Tcons LNT n (LNN2LNT_term (substituteTerm LNN t v s)) (substituteTerms LNT n (LNN2LNT_terms n ts) v (LNN2LNT_term s))".

original: intros n ts v s. induction ts using Terms_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite LNN2LNT_term. rewrite IHts. reflexivity.
